name: record-locator
description: A record locator is short, easy to read and pronounceable string. This module encodes integers into record locator strings and can decode them back to integers.

scripts.coverage: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -x wallaby.js --report text --print none --check-coverage -- -R spec

author: DKHR Limited (https://dkhr.com)
